revision.comment: Omega moved page [[D-Link DWR-710 revrev A1]] to [[D-Link DWR-710 rev A1]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DWR-710 |revision=(A1) |asin=B00KB8DK1W |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability= |type=mobile hotspot |fcc_date=06/27/2012 |fcc_id=KA2WR710A1, KA2WR710B1, |pcb_id=AW-4019 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Male-A |cpu1_brand=ST-Ericsson |cpu1_model=DB5700 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=3G modem, dongle, SIM Card slot, microSD Card slot |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=54:B8:0A }} {{TagLine|Le Petit HSPA+ 3G Modem/Router}} :[http://www.dlink.ru/mn/products/5/1948_b.html Product page]
"AW-4019" is silkscreened on the board.
*[http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA14579 Wi-Fi Certified]
